descriptionHtml:
Description : 
--------------
Give a better look to the girl\'s !!

Version 0.2 Replace :(the mod use just 1 ESP file four all the girls)

*Fix the \"darker head skin than their body\" problem !* (100% working )
*Be sure the Cute Girl s Replacer Riften v 0.2 is activated in the plugins list !!!!!! 
*Push the plugin UP in the list between 20-30 INDEX !!!!!!


Female  npc\'s :
===============
    Alessandra, a Priestess of Arkay.
    Anuriel, an Altmer Stewardess of Riften.
    Constance Michel, an Assistant of the Orphanage.
    Dinya Balu, a Priestess of Mara.
    Drifa, Bersi Honey-Hand\'s wife.
    Edda, a Beggar.
    Grelka, a Market merchant.
    Haelga, a Runner of Haelga\'s Bunkhouse.
    Hafjorg, Elgrim\'s wife.
    Ingun Black-Briar, the Black-Briar\'s daughter.
    Keerava, an Argonian female manager of the Bee and Barb.
    Laila Law-Giver, the Jarl of Riften.
    Marise Aravel, a Market merchant.
    Maven Black-Briar, the Head of the Black-Briar.
    Mjoll the Lioness, a Warrior and City protector (marriageable)
    Niluva Hlaalu, a Worker of the Meadery.
    Nivenor, Bolli\'s wife.
    Nura Snow-Shod, Vulwulf Snow-Shod\'s wif
    Svana Far-Shield, Haelga\'s niece 
    Wylandriah, the Court Wizard of Riften. 

Thieves GuildEdit :

    Sapphire
    Tonilia
    Vex
My other Mod\'s :
================
Cute Girl s Replacer Witherun v 3 by Laurkami ====http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12163

Cute Girl s Replacer Solitude v 1 by Laurkami ====http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12433
 
Cute Girl s Replacer Markarth v 1 by Laurkami ====http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12670

 Installation :
---------------

The Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) is recommended for properly installing the mod. If you use NMM, just download and install!

 Uninstalling :
---------------

Delete all the files you installed/use NMM to uninstall them. Or manually delete Cute Girl s Replacer Riften v 0.2 from your Skyrim\\Data folder.

 Conflicts :
-------------

May conflict with any other mods that change any of the above names !!!!

 Recommended / Requirements :
============================


ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii -http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168 

Coverwomen by mrLenski-look 02 -http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563#content

CALIENTE FEMALE BODY MOD - BIG BOTTOM EDITION- CBBE, y NEVERNUDE Addon - <Website>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666</Website>

  Credits:
Skyrim NPC Editor 0_67 by foretrenty
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Morwyn Kelm - for the suggested name and for a better sort of the ESP files
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
Coverwomen by mrLenski
CALIENTE FEMALE BODY MOD CBBE
